rex_interface_fund_confirmation_modal_de: This will withdraw {{amount}} from the REX smart contract. This balance will then be available on your account for normal actions.
rex_interface_fund_confirmation_modal_fu: This will deposit {{amount}} into the REX smart contract. This balance will be removed from your account and then be able to be used for the REX exchange or the rental of resources.
rex_interface_fund_subheader: Deposit or Withdraw {{chainSymbol}} from the REX system contract.
rex_interface_fund_warning_message: This will often be the first step when wanting to use REX. The {{chainSymbol}} deposited into the smart contract will be made available to either rent network resources or to lease.
rex_interface_fund_withdraw_balance: {{balance}} {{chainSymbol}} in contract that can be withdrawn
rex_interface_lease_resources_subheader: Spend {{chainSymbol}} tokens in order to rent either CPU or NET resources on the network.
rex_interface_manage_rex_confirmation_mo: You are about to change {{amountToBuyFromCpu}} from CPU to REX.
You are about to change {{amountToBuyFromNet}} from NET to REX.
rex_interface_manage_rex_subheader: Exchange your {{chainSymbol}} for REX tokens, which will compound as other users lease CPU and NET from the REX contract.
rex_interface_not_voting_or_proxying: You appear to not be meeting the minimum criteria to use this feature. In order to buy REX, you must first either vote for 21 block producers or proxy your votes.
rex_interface_rent_confirmation_modal_re: You are about to add {{payment}} to fund the renewal of a {{type}} loan of {{amount}}.
You are about to remove the renewal funds for a {{type}} loan of {{amount}}.
rex_interface_savings_deposit_or_withdra: Deposit or Withdraw REX from Savings
rex_interface_savings_header: Deposit or Withdraw REX from Savings
rex_interface_savings_subheader: Your REX tokens will usually mature after only four days, allowing you to exchange it back to EOS immediately afterwards. Depositing your REX in your Savings will cause the REX to not mature which is a good way to protect your funds at least temporarily in the event that your account is compromised.
rex_interface_savings_confirmation_modal: You are about to deposit {{amountToAddToSavings}} in your Savings.
You are about to withdraw {{amountToRemoveFromSavings}} from your Savings.
rex_interface_savings_rex_deposit: Amount to deposit in your Rex Savings (In REX)
rex_interface_savings_rex_withdraw: Amount to withdraw from your Rex Savings (In REX)
rex_lend_about_1: REX is the new EOSIO system that allow EOS token holders to lease the rights to their resources to earn a passive income.
rex_lend_about_2: The idea is that one can deposit the EOS they own into the REX smart contract, use it to purchase REX tokens, which will then automatically lease those resources to other users.
rex_lend_about_warning: Please note that only accounts that have voted for 21 block producers or proxied their voting power are allowed to use REX.
rex_not_voting_or_proxying_subheader: In order to use the REX features, your account must either be voting for a minimum of 21 block producers or proxying to a voting proxy.
rex_rent_about_subheader: REX is the new EOSIO set of contracts that allow users to rent CPU and Bandwidth resources in exchange for a fee.
rex_rent_loans_warning: Here you can view a list of all your ongoing rentals. You can also add or remove funds for the renewal of any loan by clicking on the corresponding button. If the loan is funded at the time of expiry, it will be automatically renewed.
